name: numerous small celestial bodies composed of ROCK AND METAL
name_original: numerous small celestial bodies composed of ROCK AND METAL
description:
The game is a throw back to the old asteroids game in the gameboy style. We had to scrap some features like AI due to time constraints. It was made for GBJam 5. https://itch.io/jam/gbjam-5

Controls:

  • Movement with arrows
  • Space to shoot
